name: APT Reconnaissance Phase
description: Simulation of Advanced Persistent Threat reconnaissance activities targeting organization infrastructure

techniques.name: Gather Victim Network Information: Domain Properties
Gather Victim Org Information: Business Relationships

steps.description: Perform passive DNS enumeration to identify target infrastructure

action.logicalOutcome: Discovered 15 subdomains, 8 mail servers, 3 name servers

steps.expectedResult: List of DNS records and infrastructure mapping

steps.description: Scan identified IP ranges for open ports and services

action.logicalOutcome: Identified 12 live hosts, common services: HTTP (80), HTTPS (443), SSH (22)

steps.description: Gather OSINT on organizational relationships and partners

action.logicalOutcome: Identified 5 key partners, 3 critical vendors, organizational structure

steps.expectedResult: Org chart and business relationship map

expectedDetectionIndicators.indicator: Unusual DNS query patterns from external IP
